field.name: locidDurationDescriptionStringId
field.desc: Wrapper string for the duration description, e.g 'Time added:'

field.name: locidDurationValueStringId
field.desc: Wrapper string for the duration value, e.g 'adds 5 secs'

field.name: locidStrengthDescriptionStringId
field.desc: Wrapper string for the strength description, e.g 'Damage added:'

field.name: locidStrengthValueStringId
field.desc: Wrapper string for the strength value, e.g 'adds 50 dmg'
